Class ObservableModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Network.ObservableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game
public class ObservableModel extends Object
The ObservableModel serves as a core component in the observer design pattern, enabling the functionality to register, remove, and notify observers about changes in the state of the game. It maintains a list of ObserverModel instances and ensures they are notified when relevant updates occur in the game's components.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObservableModel

      public ObservableModel()

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(ObserverModel ld)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers that will be notified of updates and changes.
      Parameters:
      ld - the ObserverModel instance to be added to the list of observers

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(ObserverModel ld)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers, preventing it from receiving future updates or notifications.
      Parameters:
      ld - the ObserverModel instance to be removed from the list of observers

    • updateAllBanks

      public void updateAllBanks(Bank bank)
      Notifies all registered observers about updates to the bank. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateBank method, passing the updated bank instance as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      bank - the updated Bank object containing the current state of game resources to be shared with all observers.

    • updateAllTileInHand

      public void updateAllTileInHand(String player, ComponentTile ct)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of the tile in the player's hand. This method iterates through the list of observers, invoking their updateTileInHand method with the given player identifier and component tile.
      Parameters:
      player - the identifier of the player whose hand is being updated
      ct - the ComponentTile instance representing the updated tile

    • updateAllUncoveredComponentTiles

      public void updateAllUncoveredComponentTiles(List<ComponentTile> ctList)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of all uncovered component tiles in the game. This method iterates through a list of observers and invokes their respective updateUncoveredComponentTiles method, passing the provided list of component tiles as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      ctList - a List of ComponentTile objects representing the uncovered component tiles whose state needs to be updated across all observers

    • updateAllShipboard

      public void updateAllShipboard(String player, Shipboard shipboard)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of a player's shipboard. The method adjusts the provided shipboard to ensure its correctness and then iterates through the list of observers to invoke their updateShipboard method, passing the player identifier and the updated shipboard.
      Parameters:
      player - the identifier of the player whose shipboard is being updated
      shipboard - the Shipboard object representing the updated state of the player's shipboard

    • updateAllShipboardList

      public void updateAllShipboardList(Map<String,Shipboard> shipboards)
      Updates the state of all shipboards by applying corrections to each shipboard and notifying all registered observers about the updated shipboard list.
      Parameters:
      shipboards - a map where the keys represent player identifiers and the values are Shipboard objects containing the state of each player's shipboard

    • updateAllFlightboard

      public void updateAllFlightboard(Flightboard flightboard)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of the flightboard. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateFlightboard method, passing the provided flightboard instance.
      Parameters:
      flightboard - the Flightboard object representing the current state of the game flightboard to be shared with all observers

    • updateAllCurrCard

      public void updateAllCurrCard(AdventureCard adventureCard)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the current adventure card. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateCurrCard method, passing the provided AdventureCard instance.
      Parameters:
      adventureCard - the AdventureCard object representing the current state of the adventure card to be shared with all observers

    • updateAllDices

      public void updateAllDices(Dices dices)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of the dices. The method iterates through each observer and invokes their respective updateDices method, passing the provided Dices instance.
      Parameters:
      dices - the Dices object representing the current state of the dices, to be shared and updated by all observers

    • updateAllCurrPlayer

      public void updateAllCurrPlayer(String currPlayer)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the current player information. This method iterates through the list of observers, invoking their updateCurrPlayer method with the provided current player identifier.
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - the identifier of the current player to be communicated to all observers

    • updateAllGamePhase

      public void updateAllGamePhase(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the current game phase. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateGamePhase method, passing the provided GamePhase instance.
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - the GamePhase object representing the current state of the game's phase to be communicated to all observers

    • updateAllCoveredComponentTiles

      public void updateAllCoveredComponentTiles(List<ComponentTile> ctList)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of all covered component tiles in the game. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their respective updateCoveredComponentTiles method, passing the provided list of component tiles as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      ctList - a List of ComponentTile objects representing the covered component tiles whose state needs to be updated across all observers

    • updateAllDeck

      public void updateAllDeck(List<AdventureCard> deck)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of the deck. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateDeck method, passing the provided list of adventure cards.
      Parameters:
      deck - a List of AdventureCard objects representing the current state of the deck to be communicated to all observers

    • updateAllStartHourglass

      public void updateAllStartHourglass(int hourglassSpot)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the start hourglass state. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateStartHourglass method with the provided hourglass spot.
      Parameters:
      hourglassSpot - the position of the hourglass to be shared with and updated by all observers

    • updateAllStopHourglass

      public void updateAllStopHourglass()
      Notifies all registered observers to update the stop hourglass state. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateStopHourglass method. It enables the synchronization of all observers with the updated state of the stop hourglass.

    • updateAllGame

      public void updateAllGame(Game game)
      Updates all ships' boards in the provided game instance by applying corrections and notifies all registered observers about the updated game state.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object representing the current state of the game containing the shipboards to be corrected and updated

    • updateAllLeaderboard

      public void updateAllLeaderboard(Map<String,Integer> leaderboard)
      Notifies all registered observers to update the state of the leaderboard. This method iterates through the list of observers and invokes their updateAllLeaderboard method, passing the provided leaderboard data.
      Parameters:
      leaderboard - a map where the keys represent player identifiers and the values represent their corresponding leaderboard scores, which need to be communicated to all observers

    • updateAllGameLoaded

      public void updateAllGameLoaded(Game game)
